Package ohos.media.audio

Class AudioCapturerCallback

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.media.audio.AudioCapturerCallback

  • public abstract class AudioCapturerCallback
extends Object
    Provides notifications about capturer configuration updates.

    Extend this abstract class and register it with AudioManager#registerAudioCapturerCallback(AudioCapturerCallback) to receive the notifications.

    Since:
    1
    See Also:
    AudioCapturerConfig
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Multimedia#AUDIO
